constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 103 (Thursday, June 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CARTWRIGHT:
H.R. 8100.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I; Section 8; Clause 1 of the Constitution states
The Congress shall have the Power To lay and collect Taxes,
Duties, Imposts, and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide
for the common Defense and general Welfare of the United
States. . .
[Page H5646]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Expedited Hiring for VA Trained Psychiatrists Act of 2022
